scripts.watch:customtheme: chokidar "packages/Webkul/CustomTheme/**/*.{php,blade.php,scss,css,js,json,png,jpg,svg}" --ignore "**/node_modules/**" --ignore "**/dist/**" -c "php artisan vendor:publish --provider=Webkul\CustomTheme\Providers\CustomThemeServiceProvider --force && php artisan optimize:clear" --await-write-finish=2000
